abstract: The calls are for lowering Pentagon spending and canceling troubled weapons programs as part of a broad effort to reduce federal budget deficits.
snippet: The calls are for lowering Pentagon spending and canceling troubled weapons programs as part of a broad effort to reduce federal budget deficits.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan group of budget experts called Wednesday for steep cuts in future military spending, just as leaders of a presidential debt-reduction commission proposed last week.

headline.main: A Second Group of Experts Calls for Cutting Military Programs to Lower U.S. Debt
headline.print_headline: A Second Group of Experts Calls for Cutting Military Programs to Lower U.S. Debt
